name: Dusk Valley - Prototype
description:
Summary of the project:

Welcome to my first solo game project! To clarify: this is a basic prototype for testing purposes, gameplay is far from final. 

Details: 

An action platformer with some rogue-like elements and cooldown abilities. Takes place on a sci-fi planet connected by ancient portals. Not sure about the rest, but it will likely be about an hour worth of gameplay if I do it right. There’s gonna be a range of enemies and a boss fight, maybe some simple NPC dialogue to sprinkle in some lore.

Development:

I plan on improving the building on the current gameplay elements and fleshing out the world. I have a lot of plans for quality of life improvements and some features that will make it a lot more fun. 

Please provide constructive feedback! I'm open to new ideas and would love to hear your thoughts :) 

Update plans:

  • Super ability (Q) will be a lot more powerful. It will also charge through combat
  • Fleshed out boss enemy with different attacks
  • Smarter AI for some enemies
  • More game feel for enemies
  • Consistent and improved lighting system
  • A few more enemies
  • Some dialogue
  • Longer levels with more challenge
  • Upgrades
  • Health and exp drop
